overview:
Taylor Jonathan Wallis born (August 8th, 1993 - August 8th, 2009) was the co-founder of Bazaar Daily News, a subsidiary of present day Bazaar Media Group.

Wallis was the co-founder, Editor & Chief, and Chief Operating Officer of the company up until his death. He and childhood friend Derick Goff started Bazaar Daily News, which is now a privately owned company based out of Seattle, Washington.

Derick Goff took creative control of the company following the death of Wallis.
